messages.content: As a child I spent a lot of time in and out of hospital â€“ the fantastic care I received then and throughout my life inspired me to become a doctor.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats plan to put mental health on an equal footing with physical health, ensuring that it is available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year which will ensure we have the mental health service and care Britain needs.

issues.health: Mention of imbalance in how NHS treats patients, especially in mental health services. Advocacy for putting mental health on equal footing with physical health.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm driven by a desire to help sick people get better. But during my six years as an NHS psychiatrist, it's become clear to me there is an imbalance at the heart of the way our NHS treats patients.

quotes.text: Approximately 1 in 4 people will face a mental health issue in the UK. The Liberal Democrats have the best plan for ensuring they get the best care.
